HotelElement.Name: The Lexington New York City (Formerly Radisson)

Address.Address1: 511 Lexington Avenue at 48th Street New York

Description.Text: Located in the heart of Manhattan's fashionable East Side, the Radisson Lexington Hotel offers guests the best of New York City all under one roof. Visitors can experience several different types of world cuisine, a top-notch dance club and superior athletic facilities without ever leaving hotel grounds. The 27-story hotel has been a hospitality landmark for decades, and now features 705 newly renovated guest rooms including a variety of suites, as well as rooms with terraces, in addition to spacious meeting facilities, luxurious amenities and a fully redesigned lobby.

The Radisson Lexington Hotel New York, ideally located in New York's Midtown business district, is steps from world-class shopping and Fortune 500 companies that include Citigroup, Pfizer, Bristol Myers and Unilever. New York attractions convenient to the Radisson Lexington Hotel New York include the Rockefeller Center, United Nations, Radio City Music Hall, Museum of Modern Art and much more.

The newly remodeled guestrooms have been designed with the frequent business and leisure traveler in mind. Some rooms feature the Sleep Number® bed. All rooms are appointed with elegant decor details such as chic roman shades, marble bathrooms. Modern guest rooms offer spacious work desks, with an ergonomic Herman Miller chair, high-speed wired internet access, cable television, pay-per-view movies, dataport and voice mail.

Remodeled in 2005-2006, Radisson Lexington Hotel New York includes a marble-floored lobby featuring contemporary decor such as sheer drapes. Looking south five blocks on Lexington Avenue outside the hotel, guests can view the 1930 Art Deco Chrysler Building and its iconic, stainless-steel ornamented top tapering to a spire.

• Golf - driving range • Ice skating • Rowing or canoeing • Swimming • Racquetball/squash • Running track/path • Tennis • Aerobics • Pilates classes/instruction • Yoga classes/instruction • Hiking/biking trails • Horse riding/rental • Helicopter/airplane sightseeing
• Major credit cards are accepted • Check In: 03:00 PM • Check Out: 12:00 PM

The Radisson Lexington is the only hotel in Manhattan with six distinct dining outlets, ranging from nouvelle Latino cuisine to the classic New York diner and authentic Chinese. Take a culinary tour of the world without leaving the grounds of the hotel - and never repeat a restaurant. Start with breakfast at Raffles Café and Starbucks; lunch at Dynasty. Unwind at the Lex Lounge - Sushi Bar, dine at Alma Grill and party at LQ.
